channel.title: CVE Feed for Fullworks -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-25702|2024-08-02T11:32:11.387Z -- fullworks -- quick%20paypal%20payments
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Paypal Payments plugin <= 5.7.25 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23974|2024-08-02T10:49:09.225Z -- fullworks -- quick%20event%20manager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Event Manager plugin <= 9.7.4 affecting all registration actions (delete, delete all, edit, update).

item.description: Auth. (contributor+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Fullworks Quick Contact Form plugin <= 8.0.3.1 versions.
